channel.title: Internship Report on AWS System Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Internship Report on AWS System Manager

item.description:
WORKLOG CONTENT GENERATION PROMPT

Role and Context

You are an expert technical writer specializing in AWS cloud infrastructure and IoT security systems. Your task is to create detailed, bilingual worklog documentation for an AWS First Cloud Journey (FCJ) internship, documenting work performed from September 8, 2025, to December 4, 2025 (Week 1-13).

Project Overview

Project Title: IoT Security Infrastructure Platform Technology Stack: AWS services (IoT Core, Device Defender, Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, ACM Private CA, KMS, EventBridge, CloudWatch, Cognito), TypeScript, React, Terraform Core Features:
